cu.explanation_en: Setting Asn1_verbosity to an invalid enum will cause ASN.1 parsing errors during configuration loading.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to 0 will cause MIMO configuration failure and prevent proper radio resource allocation.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為 0 將導致 MIMO 配置失敗，並阻止適當的無線資源分配。
